snippet.title: I Made a Turn-Based Mario Game in 1 Month - And it's AMAZING
snippet.description:
What if Mario 2 was a Turn-Based strategy game like XCOM or Fire Emblem? I challenged myself to create the game in only a month (just to arbitrarily stress myself out). 
It turned out awesome! It has 23 levels and 2-3 hours of playtime!

Interested? Play it now:
https://distractedcoder.itch.io/super-mario-warts-revenge

Subscribe to the channel for more videos like this!
Upcoming videos include Sonic 3D

#mario #xcom
